0: 01:51 NEWLINE_CHAR NEWLINE_CHAR Photograph: Mark Ralston/AFP/Getty Images NEWLINE_CHAR NEWLINE_CHAR Well, it’s been a strange one. For a while it seemed like the night was devoid of genuine surprises (which itself is not a surprise given the Academy’s history of predictable tastes) but right at the end, Warren Beatty and Faye Dunaway surprised us all by getting the best picture winner wrong. NEWLINE_CHAR NEWLINE_CHAR Jimmy Kimmel was a safe and uninspired choice as host, not bad and not Fallon but not good enough. The political speeches were subdued but effective. The skits were unfunny. But the winners were largely deserving and Moonlight in particular is one of the best choices for the big prize in years. NEWLINE_CHAR NEWLINE_CHAR There’ll undoubtedly be a whitelash from those claiming the win is a direct reaction to #OscarsSoWhite but for anyone who has seen Moonlight and experienced its unique effect they’ll understand it’s a worthy winner. NEWLINE_CHAR NEWLINE_CHAR See you next year! Apart from Beatty, who probably won’t be invited back ...
